div.p: Ruin & Wesen produce fine handbuilt musical electronic gear, both analog and digital. They build modular synthesizers, desktop sound effects, stompboxes and MIDI instruments. The marriage of analog sound production and sound shaping with digital microprocessor control makes for amazing instruments. Simple analog effects are turned into a mind-blowingly complex sound generators and processors by allowing parameters to be automated. Combining the best of both worlds, Ruin & Wesen create hands-on audio devices that challenge your brain and your ears.
